title: Ardrigal mixture

properties.name: description
properties.value: The ardrigal mixture is an item used during Legends' Quest to make a bravery potion. It is made by using an ardrigal on a vial of water. Snake weed can then be added to make the bravery potion, which is used to enter the dark cave during the quest. It can be made after completion of Legends' Quest, although it has no use.

Ardrigal mixture

Advanced data
Item ID738

The ardrigal mixture is an item used during Legends' Quest to make a bravery potion. It is made by using an ardrigal on a vial of water. Snake weed can then be added to make the bravery potion, which is used to enter the dark cave during the quest. It can be made after completion of Legends' Quest, although it has no use.

Changes[edit | edit source]

Date Changes
26 January –
27 June 2005

The item's examine was changed from "It's a mixture of Ardrigal and water, I need another ingredient to finish this potion." to "It's a mixture of Ardrigal and water. Needs another ingredient."
